title: Beijing 2022: Magic mogul skiing with Mikael Kingsbury
description: The daily podcast continues with a throwback to the interview with Canadian mogul skier Mikael Kingsbury who has recovered from a spinal injury and is looking to retain his Olympic title.
itunes:title: Beijing 2022: Magic mogul skiing with Mikael Kingsbury
itunes:summary: The daily podcast continues with a throwback to the interview with Canadian mogul skier Mikael Kingsbury who has recovered from a spinal injury and is looking to retain his Olympic title.
